boofcv.alg.feature.detect.interest

Class EasyGeneralFeatureDetector<T extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageGray<T>,D extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageGray<D>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • boofcv.alg.feature.detect.interest.EasyGeneralFeatureDetector<T,D>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeneralToInterestPoint

    public class EasyGeneralFeatureDetector<T extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageGray<T>,D extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageGray<D>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Detects features using GeneralFeatureDetector but Handles all the derivative computations automatically.

      • EasyGeneralFeatureDetector

        public EasyGeneralFeatureDetector(GeneralFeatureDetector<T,D> detector,
                                  java.lang.Class<T> imageType,
                                  java.lang.Class<D> derivType)
        Configures detector and uses default image derivatives.
        Parameters:
        detector - Feature detector.
        imageType - Type of input image
        derivType - If null then the derivative will be selected using the image type.

      • detect

        public void detect(T input,
                   boofcv.struct.QueueCorner exclude)
        Detect features inside the image. Excluding points in the exclude list.
        Parameters:
        input - Image being processed.
        exclude - List of points that should not be returned.
